# Fairies
Tiny, winged humanoids with a mystical aura. Fairies are delicate but agile. Their small stature makes them elusive, but also fragile. Their small bodies means that a comparitavely small amount of chems for a larger person go much further. Originally a luxury produced species, Faries have since escaped and reproduced, filling air ducts on thousands of staitons with small societies.
## Benefits
- Their wings allow them to accelerate very fast in zero gravity environments. - Extremely small size makes them harder to hit in combat. - Metabolizes things much more effectively than other species. - Can eat sugar to regain blood level. - Takes up a very small amount of space in bags. - Blood is a powerful narcotic, but be warned, those who imbibe too much are cursed. - Low weight means they can propel themselves in space extremely fast.
## Drawbacks
- Crits at 50 damage, dies at 75. - Triggers mouse traps. - Takes 10x damage from being flung. - Struggles to drag things much if at all due to low weight. - Animals will, more often than not, try to kill them as though they were a mouse.
